projects.SHAMIYANA APP: This project aims to develop a food delivery and ordering app for Shamiyana Cafe, to provide a hassle-free and time-saving ordering process and an easy-to-use web portal for the cafe's management. Skills used includes Flutter, Dart, Firebase.. The project uses Flutter, Dart, Firebase.
projects.RAPID: This project is a web application that enables users to play chess and other real-time games with friends via video call. It uses WebSockets for real-time communication of gameplay information and WebRTC API for the video call feature. Skills used includes NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker.. The project uses NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker.
projects.SMART SENSING MIDDLEWARE: This project will develop a web application that will collect data from smart home devices and display it in the form of graphs for better analysis and understanding. Users will be able to access the data and view it in various graphical formats to make it easier to analyze. Skills used includes ReactJS, HTML, CSS.. The project uses ReactJS, HTML, CSS.
